chapter.para: This manual contains documentation for the set of Client Tools for use with the LexisNexis HPCC. These tools include:

row.entry: An integrated development environment for ECL programmers to create, edit, and execute ECL code.
A development tool integrated into the ECL IDE, which is used to debug queries as they are developed.
Command line ECL execution tool to facilitate automation of ECL Code execution.
Command line Distributed File Utility management tool, facilitate automation of data file spray, despray, and other common file handling tasks.

sect2.title: Installation
sect2.para: The installation program installs all client tools, including the ECL IDE, ECLPlus, DFUPlus, and the ECL Command line tools.

listitem.para: From the HPCC SystemsÂ® download page, http://hpccsystems.com/download/free-community-edition/client-tools
Download the appropriate Client Tools for your Operating System. (available for CentOS, Ubuntu, Mac OSX, or Windows)
Install the client tools software to your machine.
Run the executable file, for example: hpccsystems-clienttools_community-4.X.X-XWindows-i386.exe on your machine. Follow the prompts to complete the installation.
An RPM installation package is provided. Install RPM with the -Uvh switch, the U or upgrade will perform an upgrade if a previous version is already installed. sudo rpm -Uvh <rpm file name>
For Ubuntu installations a Debian package is provided. To install the package, use:
Run the installation file, for example: hpccsystems-clienttools_community-4.X.X-XDarwin-x86_64.dmg. Follow the prompts to complete the installation.
